image.modcmds:
[Capture the Flag = default] -f config_ctf.cfg
[Deathmatch] -f config_dm.cfg
[Team Deathmatch] -f config_tdm.cfg
image.configedit:
[autoexec.cfg] cfg sv_max_clients %slots% bindaddr %ip% sv_bindaddr %ip% sv_port %port%
[config_ctf.cfg] cfg sv_max_clients %slots% bindaddr %ip% sv_bindaddr %ip% sv_port %port%
[config_dm.cfg] cfg sv_max_clients %slots% bindaddr %ip% sv_bindaddr %ip% sv_port %port%
[config_tdm.cfg] cfg sv_max_clients %slots% bindaddr %ip% sv_bindaddr %ip% sv_port %port%
